# AuthenticationPlugins class

A registry of known authentication plugins.

```csharp
public static class AuthenticationPlugins
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [Register](AuthenticationPlugins/Register.md)(…) | Registers the specified authentication plugin. The name of this plugin must be unique. |
